explanation.title: How Conway's Game of Life Works
explanation.rule1: Any live cell with fewer than two live neighbours dies, as if by underpopulation.
explanation.rule2: Any live cell with two or three live neighbours lives on to the next generation.
explanation.rule3: Any live cell with more than three live neighbours dies, as if by overpopulation.
explanation.rule4: Any dead cell with exactly three live neighbours becomes a live cell, as if by reproduction.
